Title: The GOP has allowed Trump to expand his authority. Here's where they're pushing back

Title: A 101-year-old runs the largest nutcracker museum in the U.S. Here's a look inside
Description:
Arlene Wagner has been collecting nutcrackers for nearly 50 years.
Now, she's got one of the largest collections in the world, housed at the Leavenworth Nutcracker Museum in Washington.

Description:
